name: Welcome to Tiny Town, Small World
name_original: Welcome to Tiny Town, Small World
description:
(Webgl is broken, we will upload a fix once the rating period is done)

Tiny town is a nice place with nice people. You will go around and help everyone with various quests but for the sole reason of getting the heck out of there. Its too nice there and because of that you are dying! The only thing that prolongs your existence is eating and collect some gems to chuck them into a portal to get the heck out. 

https://github.com/CiberTurtle/BTP-2021
